name: Depfu Dark Mode
description:
A simple and clean Dark mode for depfu.com, a dependency manager for open source projects. Only applies to the Depfu dashboard, not the homepage!!

Current version: v1.0.3
additional_info:
v1.0.3 - Enabled the style on the repository setup screen
v1.0.2 - Fixed the PR assignee select box background colour
v1.0.1 - Fixed primary callout not being styled
v1.0.0 - Initial Release
